attributes.title: Ashtanga Yoga - Asana: Reprogram Your Brain (Patanjali Yoga Sutras 99) Nithyananda Satsang 20 Jan 11
attributes.description:
Today was a big breakthrough for Paramahamsa Nithyananda's mission. It was the first online NSP. Many from around the world were sitting with Paramahamsa Nithyananda via teleconferencing, and in return, he was in many halls around the world, including: New York, Houston, Seattle, San Jose, Los Angeles, Columbus, Vancouver, Toronto, Singapore, Guadeloupe, Malaysia.

Satsang means being in the company of the ultimate truth. Truth has a unique quality. When you are in the company of it , it makes you as it. Truth is a living happening. When you are in the company of the ultimate truth, Sat, it just fills you, you become that. Watching this broadcast, everyone was literally in the company of the ultimate truth- physically, mentally and verbally.

To prove this, Paramahamsa Nithyananda is conducting three experiments. The 1st experiment: to teleport vibhooti (sacred ash) to the padhukas (Paramahamsa Nithyananda's sandals) at each of the centers. The energized deity or padhuka is an independent intelligence. It responds to your prayers, emotions and thoughts independently and immediately. Paramahamsa Nithyananda was awakening the intelligence and independence of the padhukas.

The 2nd experiment:  materialize vibhooti in the hands of the people experiencing Kundalini awakening. His 3rd experiment will get vibhooti to materialize in the hands of non believers! It is actually not materializing, it is teleporting. Tomorrow when the vibhooti is teleporting, he promised to have a glass test tube here with the vibhooti, to prove that the vibhooti reduces where he is, and appears at the centres around the world.

Patanjali explains how after conquering the pain and pleasures of the body you are no longer bound by it. In the last sutras Paramahamsa Nithyananda explained the theory of being steady and comfortable. In this discourse he gave the technique to make the body balanced. If you keep the body balanced you can go beyond pain and pleasure, and the intense, innate, inside pleasure gets awakened. When you are alive in your muscles, the pleasure created is so strong, so intense that you will go beyond outer pleasures.

He guided the audience into the correct posture, then aligned the nadi centres using bija (seed) mantras. It was an exhilarating way to begin the day.
